- Door/material: Steel entry door; brushed-nickel lever handle; electronic keypad deadbolt (Schlage). Location: exterior entry surface (photo shows interior side in hallway context).
- Surface condition: Brown paint with scattered rust spots and peeling finish; corrosion near the lock area.
- Moisture concern: Rust indicates moisture exposure; check door seal/weatherstripping and frame for intrusion.
- Hardware: Keypad deadbolt present; verify battery and lock operation.
- Recommendation: Repaint/refinish and treat rust; inspect jamb and weatherseal; ensure proper lock function and frame integrity.
